message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with a machine learning problem of selecting the optimal cohort of new employees from a large set of job applicants, which involves allocating limited interviewing resources and balancing cheap but noisy resume screenings and expensive but in-depth in-person interviews. This problem falls under the category of combinatorial pure exploration (CPE) in the multi-armed bandit setting, which is a subfield of machine learning. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also deals with optimization and decision-making, which are common themes in the sub-categories of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). The paper also involves theoretical analysis and algorithm design, which are relevant to the sub-categories of cs.CC (Computational Complexity) and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
